page.title: 20Matthew's Pets
page.content:
The{dog}is the second pet we ever had. She is about 3 years old and about 50 centimetres high; She is fed every night. One of the{cats,}called Tatty, is our oldest pet and our other cat, Purdy, is about 18 months old, (Tatty is about 12 human years).
I also have 2{American Garter Snakes which are red sided, their names are Dennis and Daisy. Daisy is the bigger. They are fed every day on worms or fish.
The 2{terrapins,}Terry and George, are quite old. They are fed on fish also. The{rabbit}and the{mouse}both belong to my sister and eat the same sort of things. We have 9 baby {goldfish}and 1 grown up one. 5 are my sister's and 5 are mine.
